title: Divine Blossom Diamond Haaram with Emerald and Pearl Drops
materials: Crafted in 18K Gold with a radiant Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS clarity
a central Emerald (1.65 carats) in the pendant

and delicate Freshwater Pearls. The design also incorporates ruby accents (2.25 carats). Total gross weight: 149.220 grams. Diamond weight (necklace): 15.00 carats. Diamond weight (pendant): 3.84 carats.
features: This exquisite haaram features a cascading floral design, intricately set with diamonds. The pendant boasts a peacock-inspired motif with a central emerald, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. Delicate pearl drops enhance the necklace's ethereal beauty. The setting ensures maximum brilliance for each diamond, creating a stunning visual effect.
colors: Predominantly gold with shimmering white diamonds. The central emerald adds a vibrant pop of green
complemented by the soft luster of the pearls. Ruby accents provide subtle red highlights.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other festive celebrations. Also suitable for formal events where you want to make a statement with timeless elegance.
description: A true heirloom piece, this Diamond Haaram showcases impeccable craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls makes it a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting, radiant finish. A stunning embodiment of South Indian jewelry artistry, perfect for the discerning collector.
